name: uplifted
description: The name of the project is uplifted and our coffee concept is based on serving high quality coffee to people who love coffee and need it in their daily life. we will sell drinks with a focus on providing at speed. We will sell coffee with all its types, such as espresso coffees, handmade coffees, soothing hot alternatives and so many more. we will also provide a light lunch menu and pastries that we believe will make our coffee shop unique and differente from the others.
author: Basma Kasmi & Amal Trak
